EmailTemplate.name: 20141120 Enrichment Primary
EmailTemplate.subject: Primary Enrichment Term 2, 2014-2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.SchoolText__c} Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
20th November 2014
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
Primary Enrichment Online Registration
We will be starting registration for Primary Enrichment activities in December. It is important that you read the document in the link below for detailed information about Enrichment:
Important Primary Enrichment Information (http://www.britishschool.edu.my/media/689875/BSKL%20TERM%202%20ENRICHMENT%20PROGRAMME%20INFORMATION.pdf)
Online registration forms for Term 2 will be open starting from Monday, 1st December 2014, 9am and closes on Friday, 5th December 2014, 2pm. The links to registrations forms according to respective Year Groups are listed below:
Years 1 & 2 (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1MzZjU5U3t8qldk-YLOPwgnIwwNAMo4Fp0Rt6cvUgwB8/viewform?usp=send_form)
Years 3 & 4 (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/14ALM6FJ3SBefLrWvocfGsezc1xDZ89qwu4dOQR_LOfk/viewform?usp=send_form)
Years 5 & 6 (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1rkmjGC2Ip4kY12_tFF27w3tKyeX5n09EDMNQiEVtaoM/viewform?usp=send_form)
Kind regards
Admin Team
{!Contact.SchoolText__c} World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ {!User.School_List_Email_Footer__c}
